question: UK's House of Lords voted to amend the Brexit Bill. Which among the following was the main reason for the house to delay the bill's passing?
option1: The bill doesn't guarantee protection to EU citizens living in UK
option2: The bill doesn't guarantee protection to UK citizens living in the EU
option3: The bill doesn't speak the mandate of the people
option4: The bill doesn't fulfil the requirements of the Brexit negotiations
answer: The bill doesn't guarantee protection to EU citizens living in UK
